projectList.name: Azurite Game Engine
projectList.description: Azurite is an open source 2D java game engine built on LWJGL. I am the lead project manager of a team of international developers who contribute to the engine.

projectList.name: Azurite Website
projectList.description: This is a website and accompanying documentation site I built for the Azurite Game Engine.

projectList.name: Cuda Influenza model
projectList.description: An agent-based influenza virus model examining the effects of cellular regeneration on cell-to-cell and cell-free viral transmission. This is research I am doing at TCU using GPU compute to accelerate the modeling of large viral simulations.

projectList.name: Multi client chat app
projectList.description: C++ chat application using sockets to broadcast messages sent by individual users to all other users via a server middleman. It was developed with a friend.

projectList.name: Multiplayer snake
projectList.description: A multiplayer snake game developed with a friend. It utilises sockets to send player data between a client and server.

projectList.name: OurJSEditor.com
projectList.description: I contributed to the Open Source project OurJSEditor, revamping the design of the site for improved UX and cleanliness.

projectList.name: Stock portfolio tracker
projectList.description: NodeJS/Express based website that queries the Finnhub stock API to display stock information and track the total gains/losses in a portfolio. The portfolio data is saved in MongoDB using Mongoose.

projectList.name: Flask/Socket IO Chat
projectList.description: This is a Flask and socket.io based chat application. It supports multiple users and multiple rooms.

projectList.name: MyVariety IT Services
projectList.description: This is a mockup design I created for MyVariety IT in their efforts to redesign their landing page.
